note.p: Scottish. Third daughter of Alan Ker of Greenock. Married the dissident preacher Alexander John Scott in 1830. They had two children, Susan Fisher Scott and John Alexander Scott. Ann and Susan were with Annie Darwin during her last illness at Malvern in 1851.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/182/61/11)
letter from Emma Darwin to Anne Elizabeth Darwin, [4 or 11 April 1851] (DAR 210.13: 4)
Scotland old parish registers births 564/3 30 5 Greenock Old or West (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 17 September 2018)
